directions.step:
Salt & pepper each quail. Put in paper sack with flour & toss to coat. Butter bottom of iron skillet or Dutch oven & place quail in skillet. Pour melted butter over quail, making sure it covers each one. Pour water in bottom of skillet & put lid on top. Cook at 300 for 2 hours or longer. Add more water if needed. Use water drippings to make gravy.
JEWELL GRIFFIN
From <Simply Southern>, the Desoto School Mothers' Assn, Helena-West Helena, AR 72390. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
